FizzBuzzExecutor - Class in org.example.fizzbuzz
Executes the FizzBuzzManager in a multi-threaded environment, managing the collection and output of results.

Constructs a FizzBuzzExecutor with the specified FizzBuzzManager.
FizzBuzzManager - Class in org.example.fizzbuzz
Manages the execution of FizzBuzz tasks in a multi-threaded environment, allowing concurrent generation of Fizz, Buzz, FizzBuzz, and number outputs.
FizzBuzzManager(int) - Constructor for class org.example.fizzbuzz.FizzBuzzManager
Constructs a FizzBuzzManager to run tasks up to the given number.

O

org.example - package org.example
 
org.example.fizzbuzz - package org.example.fizzbuzz
Provides classes to execute the FizzBuzz problem in a multi-threaded environment.
org.example.timer - package org.example.timer
This package contains classes and interfaces for a timer application that displays the time elapsed since the start of the program and outputs a message every 5 seconds.

S

The SchedulerController class manages the scheduling of tasks to write data at regular intervals.

Starts the execution of FizzBuzz tasks using four threads.

Starts the scheduler to write data at regular intervals.

T

Timer - Class in org.example.timer
